application.doc: Retrieve a list of all Reverse Proxy Instances

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve a list of all Reverse Proxy Instances.
method.doc: To retrieve a list of all Reverse Proxy Instances with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the API Access Control resource instance URI.
Note that prior to running this web service the Verify Identity Access administrator credential must be stored using the Store the Verify Identity Access administrator credentials web service.
Note that list of Reverse Proxy Instances will only include instances that exist in the stored credentials secure domain.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.doc: The list of existing reverse proxy instances.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the reverse proxy instance.

param.name: listening
param.doc: The list of addresses that the reverse proxy instance is listening on.

param.name: restart
param.doc: A boolean indicating whether or not the reverse proxy instance needs to be restarted for changes to take effect.
